tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE designer_profiles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    portfolio_url VARCHAR(255),
    past_work TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE designer_profiles (
    designer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    bio TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE designer_portfolios (
    portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    project_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_designer_id FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designer_profiles(designer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE designer_past_work (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT,
    work_name VARCHAR(255),
    year_completed INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE designer_profiles (
    designer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50),
    designer_email VARCHAR(100),
    designer_phone VARCHAR(20),
    designer_bio TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE designer_portfolios (
    portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT,
    portfolio_title VARCHAR(100),
    portfolio_description TEXT,
    portfolio_image_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE designer_past_work (
    work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT,
    work_title VARCHAR(100),
    work_description TEXT,
    work_image_url VARCHAR(255),
    year_completed INT
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(100),
    show_date DATE,
    show_location VARCHAR(100),
    designer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE DesignerProfiles (
    designer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    designer_age INT,
    designer_location VARCHAR(50),
    designer_bio TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DesignerPortfolios (
    portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT REFERENCES DesignerProfiles(designer_id),
    portfolio_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    portfolio_description TEXT,
    portfolio_images INT
);

CREATE TABLE PastWorks (
    work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT REFERENCES DesignerProfiles(designer_id),
    work_title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    work_description TEXT,
    work_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE FashionShows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    show_location VARCHAR(50),
    show_date DATE,
    show_description TEXT
);
